name: web-app-boilerplate
description: This is a boilerplate project for a web application created with TypeScript, React, Express, MongoDB, Webpack, and Jest.

scripts.build: concurrently "cd backend && npm run build" "cd frontend && npm run build"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"

author: paullog_
